channel.title: staticmethod on Dinis Peixoto
channel.description: Recent content in staticmethod on Dinis Peixoto

item.title: @staticmethod vs @classmethod
item.description: Object-oriented programming in Python is far from being perfect. There are, however, some built-in functions that help programmers achieve OOP as we can find in truly OOP languages like Java or C#. Today I will try to clarify the purpose of two built-in decorators that are widely used in the context of OOP: @staticmethod and @classmethod. Let’s consider the example below of an Example python class, with a method, a static method and a class method.
